wikipedia_page.main: Kristian Adams (born 26 November 1976) is a former English professional cricketer who played for Kent County Cricket Club and Lincolnshire County Cricket Club as a bowler. He was a right-handed batsman and a left-arm medium-fast bowler. He was born in Cleethorpes in Lincolnshire.

response: *Kristian Adams, cricketer, played for Kent and Lincolnshire, born in Cleethorpes
